name: BuddyCart
desc: BuddyCart is an online shopping website that specializes in providing groceries and items for general needs to customers in the local area. The website is designed to provide customers with a hassle-free shopping experience from the comfort of their own homes.
highlights: Used the JSON-Server to Fetch the data

name: CodeVortex AI-Powered Interview Mock App
desc: CodeVortex is an AI-powered interview application designed for conducting mock interviews. It offers functionalities such as asking questions to candidates, generating feedback based on their responses, and storing candidate progress and records.
highlights: AI-powered mock interview application with question asking, feedback generation, and progress tracking.
Utilizes OpenAI API for AI capabilities

name: HealCare
desc: HealCare is an appointment booking system website where patients can easily book appointments with doctors.
stacks: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express.js, JSON Web Token (JWT), MongoDB, Sequelize, OAuth
highlights: Allows patients to book appointments with doctors
Integrates OAuth for seamless user authentication

name: Brief.ly
desc: This portfolio showcases a web application project that offers link shortening, detailed analytics, and QR code generation.
highlights: Shorten URLs and convert link to QR
Create custom QR codes for custom payments

name: ShoeKeeper
desc: ShoeKeeper is an online shopping website that specializes in providing a wide range of shoes to customers around the world. The website is designed with a user-friendly interface that allows customers to easily browse and purchase their desired footwear.
highlights: On Landing page, product detail cards data Fetch through API.
Product Page with Filter by Product , Sort by Price

name: CosmetiCare
desc: CosmetiCare is an Indian online marketplace for beauty and wellness products. It offers a wide range of skincare, haircare, makeup, and personal care products from various brands.
highlights: On Landing page, product detail cards data Fetch through API.
Product Page with Filter by Product , Sort by Price
